mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT t.id, t.uniq_code, t.event_code, t.security_incident_id, t."name", t.template_id, TO_CHAR(t.start_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as start_time, TO_CHAR(t.end_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as end_time, t.src_geo_region, t.security_zone, t.device_address, t.device_send_product_name, t.send_host_address, t.machine_code, t.rule_type, t.focus_ip, t.attacker, t.victim, t.severity, t.cat_outcome, t.payload, t.more_field, t.time_part, t.top_event_type_chinese, t.second_event_type_chinese FROM t_risk_incidents_out_going t where t.time_part BETWEEN CAST(#{startTime} AS timestamp) and CAST(#{endTime} AS timestamp) and t.more_field is not null and (t.end_time != (select end_time from t_risk_incidents_out_going_history where uniq_code = t.uniq_code order by time_part desc limit 1) or t.uniq_code not in ( select DISTINCT uniq_code from t_risk_incidents_out_going_history where time_part BETWEEN CAST(#{startTime} AS timestamp) and CAST(#{lastTermTime} AS timestamp))) limit #{size,jdbcType=BIGINT} offset #{offset,jdbcType=BIGINT}
